EmailTemplate.description: MILITARY (ECCN contains Roman Numerals) Use when requesting customer to provide Export information for exports from the United States
EmailTemplate.name: Export License Info Required - Military/D&S Shipment Originating in US
EmailTemplate.subject: Information Needed {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
Purchase Order Number: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}
The following part numbers ------------, ----------------------&------------- are on export block and we need the below documents to apply for the U.S. Department of State export license:
- DSP 83 form - Updated Export Questionnaire (attached).
The receipt of the export license from the U.S. Department of State can take up to 10 weeks after submission to the United States government.
If you have questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
